g.text: Hydrogen (H2)going into the reactor:0.00tons per day
Ammonia (NH3)coming out of the reactor:0.00tons per day
Carbon dioxide (CO2) leaving the reactor: 2.5 tons per day
Amount of methane (CH4) to start with .......................... 1 ton per dayCost of methane (CH4) .......... $50 per ton
Cost of electricity ................. $140 per dayAmount of hydrogen (H2) made to start with .. 0.46 tons per dayCarbon dioxide (CO2) made & sent into the atmosphere .................. 0 tons per day
Cost to put carbon dioxide (CO2) in the ground so it doesnât get in the atmosphere ............ $5 per ton CO2
Money earned by selling urea(CH4N2O) fertilizer ....... $125 per ton ureaNote: when urea (CH4N2O) fertilizer is used, CO2 escapes back into the atmosphere.
Cost of iron catalyst ................. $1 per dayCost of osmium catalyst ...... $100 per dayMoney earned by selling ammonia (NH3) fertilizer .............. $100 per ton NH3
Carbon dioxide (CO2) made & sent into the atmosphere by burning fuel to heat the reactor ... 5 tons CO2 per day
Methane cost ($ per day) ..... Cost to stop carbon dioxide pollution ($ per day) .Catalyst cost ($ per day) ...... Electricity cost ($ per day) ....Total costs ($ per day) ..........
Money earned selling ammonia ($ per day) ............Money earned sellingurea ($ per day) ...................Total earnings ($ per day) ....
Ammonia sold (tons per day) .. Urea sold (tons per day) ......... Profit, = earnings - costs($ per day) ..............................Carbon dioxide pollutionmade (tons per day) ...............
